nodes.text: Ankmeer Plaza was a public plaza located in the Lower Industrial Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Damrosch the Hutt oversaw his nearby factory from the plaza.
Ankmeer Plaza appears as part of the Lower Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
